name: Collie Quest
description:
This is Collie-Quest! 

It is my first ever gamejam and was submitted for Trijam #214. I "completed" it in 3 hours but  it has no menu, no sound, and it kind of is broken... but I'm still really proud. 

I will likely do a release of this with a cleaner  build later this week.

-- 

Collie-Quest with a little bit of love/polish (2h of extra work located below):

https://l3pu5.itch.io/collie-quest-post-relase

--

NB: The game is literally broken. The scene reloads with incorrect values upon reload and the wolves break. I learnt so much doing this project though!

-- Controls --

W A S D - move

Mouse - Aim

Mouse click - 'Shoot a "Bark"' but do NOT bark at the sheep! That will scare them. You must ONLY bark at the foxes/wolves/thing.

--

Things I learned

--

Time management;

I do not need half the mechanics I thought I did (I spent 20-60 minutes trying to get a line renderer to work or some fancy sheep-run-away AI that wasn't even necessary. I could have made the game just fine without it and would have had time for menu and sound maybe!) 

I learned about Tilemaps and doing 2d Unity (never tried before!)

I did my first proper pixel art (16x16!)
